data.persona: I feel the scribblings of an inexperienced musician on my skin.  Other papers nearby laugh as I am defiled by disorderly notes and jabbings.  Perhaps I should have stayed with the tree...but that wasn't my choice, after all.
data.description:
You are in the The Choir room.
It is a room with a table in the middle with chairs around it.  There is a closet that contains Choir robes that are long white and green accents.  There is a small keyboard in the corner.
There's a room here.
A choir room is here.

You are carrying some writing paper.
